metadata.title: CVE-2024-57938 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/sctp: Prevent autoclose integer overflow in sctp_association_init()While by default max_autoclose equals to INT_MAX / HZ, one may setnet.sctp.max_autoclose to UINT_MAX. There is code insctp_association_init() that can consequently trigger overflow.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
